metadata: Franz Liszt's treatments of the works of other composers | Gaetano Donizetti | Gaetano Donizetti
metadata_info: Concatenation of page title, section title and table caption.
cell: The sections are: (1) Trio du second acte and (2) Fantaisie sur des motifs favoris de l`opéra: Chanson à boire (Orgie), Duo and Finale
Marche et cavatine de Lucie de Lammermoor
Intended as part of the Reminiscences (S.397) but separated by the publisher
Valse à capriccio sur deux motifs de Lucia et Parisina
Combines motifs from Lucia di Lammermoor and Parisina. The Valse à capriccio, S.401 was revised as No. 3 of 3 Caprices-Valses, S.214 (1850-52).
Valse à capriccio sur deux motifs de Lucia et Parisina
Combines motifs from Lucia di Lammermoor and Parisina. The Valse à capriccio, S.401 was revised as No. 3 of 3 Caprices-Valses, S.214 (1850-52).
Nuits d`été à Pausilippe, 12 ariettas and nocturnes (voices and chamber ensemble; 1836): ,  , No. 1, Barcajuolo , No. 9, L`Alito di Bice , No. 4, La Torre di Biasone
Lost; this was based on Theodor Kullak`s transcription (paraphrase), Op. 31, which was itself dedicated to Liszt.
